sqlMap.insert: insert into Tbl_Mb_Info (id, version, plNo, userName, certificateTypeId, certificateNo, realName, sex, address, zipCode, mobile, phone, email, password, cardNo, realNameStatus, realNameTime, registerTime, registerWay, createdDatetime, lastUpdatedDatetime, lastUpdatedBy, creator, deleted) values (#id#, 1, #plNo#, #userName#, #certificateTypeId#, #certificateNo#, #realName#, #sex#, #address#, #zipCode#, #mobile#, #phone#, #email#, #password#, #cardNo#, #realNameStatus#, #realNameTime#, #registerTime#, #registerWay#, #createdDatetime#, #lastUpdatedDatetime#, #lastUpdatedBy#, #creator#, #deleted#)
sqlMap.update: update Tbl_Mb_Info set version = #version# +1, plNo = #plNo#, userName = #userName#, certificateTypeId = #certificateTypeId#, certificateNo = #certificateNo#, realName = #realName#, sex = #sex#, address = #address#, zipCode = #zipCode#, mobile = #mobile#, phone = #phone#, email = #email#, password = #password#, cardNo = #cardNo#, realNameStatus = #realNameStatus#, realNameTime = #realNameTime#, registerTime = #registerTime#, registerWay = #registerWay#, createdDatetime = #createdDatetime#, lastUpdatedDatetime = #lastUpdatedDatetime#, lastUpdatedBy = #lastUpdatedBy#, creator = #creator#, deleted = #deleted# where id = #id#
